summary.span: Represents the element used in XML encryption.

span.span: Represents the element used in XML encryption.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表``加密的文件 XML 簽章 XML 加密規格所定義的項目。The class represents the `` element of an encrypted document XML signature defined by the XML encryption specification. 類別包含參考和由包含在另一個金鑰所加密的項目項目。The class contains references to and elements that were encrypted by a key contained within another element. 類別會使用項目參考項目，和項目參考項目。The class uses elements to reference elements, and elements to reference elements. 您可以只加入或物件加入至集合。You can add only or objects to the collection. 如需 XML 加密標準的詳細資訊，請參閱http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core。For more information about XML encryption standards, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core.
